code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddUser=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[role,setRole]=useState('');const handleAddUser=async()=>{try{await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/add-user',{username,password,role});console.log('User added successfully');}catch(error){console.error('Error adding user',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add User"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Username",onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Role",onChange:e=>setRole(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddUser,children:"Add User"})]});};export default AddUser;
